metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8598 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in the zmq interface in csp_if_zmqhub.c in the libcsplibrary v1.4 and earlier allows hostile computers connected via a zmqinterface to execute arbitrary code via a long packet.

criterions.comment: libcsp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
